title: Jonathan Majors’ Driver Claims Actor’s Ex-Girlfriend Was “Doing Everything” During Alleged Attack
description:
Actor Jonathan Majors, known for his role as Kang the Conqueror throughout the Marvel Cinematic Universe, was arrested earlier this year for alleged domestic abuse against his now ex-girlfriend. The two were said to be in a vehicle together at the time, with the driver now claiming that the alleged victim was “doing everything” while [...]

title: Eddie Murphy Returns In ‘Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F’ Trailer
description:
The Beverly Hills Cop film franchise began in 1984. Eddie Murphy starred in the film which quickly became a major success.
